unfollow.title: Do you want to stop following?

track.title: Tracking runners
track.name: Runner name
track.disclaimer: This list only shows upcoming races within 7 days and can be updated every 10 minutes at most. To view the latest results, please press on the list item.
track.empty: No competitions found in the upcoming 7 days

error.clubRequired: At least one club is required
error.classRequired: At least one class is required
error.tooManyClasses: The amount of classes will slow down the tracking process significantly.

hints.name: Name of the runner, it must match the name in the results exactly.
hints.club: You can add multiple clubs and we will look for a runner that exist in any of the clubs.
hints.class: Add all the classes that the runner could be  competing in. If you add multiple classes, we will look for a runner that exist in any of the classes.

body: LiveOL is an app that displays orienteering-results live.
You get the latest results on your phone or tablet with a convenient interface in multiple languages.
LiveOL integrates many Orienteering related services, like liveresultat.orientering.se and Eventor Sweden.
Our vision is to be the best orienteering platform for mobile devices.

changeTextSize.text: Change the size of the text by using the buttons down below.
changeTextSize.title: Change text size

info.title: Information

translations.freePlus: Help out with translating the app and get free LiveOL+

clubs.text: Quickly access the results of any club in a competition.

box.text: Get the most out of LiveOL and support its continued development. Check out LiveOL+ today:
